title: Ticket #1505: Checkpoint Server REQUEST_TIMEOUT should be a knob
description:
The checkpoint server has a very short hard coded 5 second timeout when waiting for the shadow to talk to it. On a burdened submit machine, it could be possible that the shadows can't complete their initial packet write in 5 seconds and when this happens the ckpt server cuts the connection resulting in a shadow exception.

It gets worse in that if there are many shadows doing this, 5 seconds of wasted connections are being held, stopping valid xfers from occurring.
